page.title: 19W.I.and Youth Club
page.content: The Women's Institute is a strong and flourishing group in the village.It attracts a wide cross-section of village people who bring many different views to their meetings.The posts of President,Secretary and Treasurer are all held by local village people.It has a varied programme with day visits to other parts of the area being very important.It still has an emphasis on country pursuits. The Youth Club which is linked to Old Dalby Church meets on a Wednesday at 6pm. in the primary school.A rota of local parents run the 1.5 hour sessions.The age group is from 8 to 12 years.They have many outings.The members help to raise money for equipment.The older children would like to have a Youth Club as well.
